incidence per 100 000 population.
Degree of achievement or failure can be expressed in
percentages.
Example:
If the operational target is to fully immunize all
children below one year of age and evaluation
showed that out of 10 000 children below one year
of age only 9000 were fully immunized then the
degree of achievement is only 90%.  This is 10%
less than what was expected.
The reasons behind success or failure should be
determined.
